features: 🚗【3” IPS SCREEN FULL HD 1080P DASHCAMS】- The dash cam with card FHD 1920X1080P at 30 fps video enable to capture every road conditions and license plates details. You can read the license plate on the car dash camera up to 30 feet from the vehicle. 3" Super large IPS Display screen dash camera for cars can show the real-time image, helps you see every details when playing back on car dashcam or your PC. Also 170°Ultra-wide field of car camera reduces the blind spots and captures more details

🚙【SUPER NIGHT VISION AND WDR TECHNOLOGY CAR CAMERAS】- This dash camera for car uses an advanced sensor with LED lights to ensure full HD recording during the day and night. Dashboard Camera is designed with F1.8 aperture and Wide Dynamic Range, thus when you driving in the evening with this front dash cam that will be safer and reliable. Dash cam charger with USB port,👍no worry about the charging problems of phones/mobile electronic devices even thought using this dashcam

🚕【CAR CAMERA DASH CAM HAVE G-SENSOR & LOOP RECORDING】- The dashcam for cars has highly-sensitive G-sensor, once the vehicle collides, car cam will lock the current video and prevent it from being overwritten to ensure the evidence is intact. The video is auto saved every1,3,or 5 minutes (you can set it). When memory card (Included) is fulled, the dash cams auto overwrites the oldest videos to ensure continuous recording,which keep recording your happy driving journey.Dash-cam is worth having🏆

🚌【PLUG AND PLAY & AUTO RECORDING CAR CAMERA FRONT】- This dashboard camera for cars comes with suction cup for the windshield. Easily and securely mount the car on-dash mounted cameras to your windshield in seconds and car dashcams can be easily detached. As front car camera is power supplied from cigarette lighter port, it will power on and record automatically when your car turn on. Don't worry the dashcams for cars front won't drain your car battery

🚕【32GB CARD & ONE YEARS SATISIFITED WARRANTY FRONT DASH CAM】 - Dash cam for cars come with a free 32GB card. When you get the car dashboard camera, you can use it immediately. ☞You can set the camera for car to turn off the screen auto but the front dash camera for cars still keep recording（30seconds/1Min/2Min）. You are fully covered by our 1 YEAR WARRANTY & LIFETIME TECH SUPPORT with car dash camera front, all you need to do is write to us directly. We will respond within 12 hours

📌📌 Important Function Settings for Dash Camera on Daily Using: Gravity sensor level choose "low"; Loop recording select "3 minutes"; Motion detection choose "off"; Parking monitor select "on"; Auto power off select "off"; If you feel that the screen is on all the time afraid that it will affect your driving, screen saver select "off", car dash cam is still recording; "Fill light" can be switched off during the day and on during the night. Want dash cam 24 hours recording, Pls use hardwire kit

📌📌Dash Cam with 32GB Card, already inserted in "TF" port of the car camera dash cam. As a manufacturer and supplier of car cameras - dash cam, we collect the earliest data and feedback to solve problems, update the dashboard camera and provide our customers with a good value for money product and provide 100% after-sales supports. If the 32GB card, car charger or suction cup broken, you can tell us for replacement

📌📌Frequently questions and solutions for car dash camera: The dash cam freeze or can't turn on👉Use the paper clip(package included) to poke the "RESET" hole, you can reset the factory setting, fix the FREEZE or other can't work questions well. ✍Please plug the car charger (Length 3.5m/11.48ft )to car cigarette lighter to power the dash cam, not the MINI usb cable. 👉Kindly reminder: LONG press "M" button to switch the Video/Photo/Playback 3 Modes; "Power button" is the "OK button"

📌📌About the built-in lithium battery of the dash cam: All dashcams on the market with a built-in lithium battery only support collision detection when parked and can automatically turn on and record video for about 20 seconds, then turn off. 👉You want the dash cam front record 24/7 hours, or your car don't have cigarette lighter, pls use hardwire kit (ASIN: B088QYTFRT) to charge.👉The MINI USB cable and card reader are only for connecting to your computer and playback videos

📌📌Important things you need to know: 👈This dash camera will turn on and off with your cars. 👉There is one exception. If your car cigarette lighter is a constant power source, the car camera won't turn off when your car is turned off. Check that car cigarette lighter is a constant power source before you buy it. ⁉HOW to check? Plug the car charger into cigarette lighter, turn off your car you can see car charger if have the blue lighter. If yes, your cigarette lighter is constant power source

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SSONTONG Dash Camera with Memory Card Included---GUARD YOUR CAR SAFETY, GET YOUR DRIVING UNDER CONTROL! Best Deal Front Dash Cam . At SSONTONG, What we sell is not just the dash cams, it is our obsession - whether the user experience is good, whether the video quality is clear enough, whether the product performance is good enough and all the features. Warm Tips: (NO Wireless/wifi/gps) This dash cam with card builts in 300mAh battery is just to emergency recording and save settings. Please keep the car recorders camera plugged in always, the vehicle camera will shut down after 5 seconds when there is no external power connection.Please format the Memory card (have inserted into the "TF" port of dash cam before packaged) on dash camera before using.If the car camera screen shows "card full" even with loop recording function open of this dash cam, adjust the sensitivity of the G-sensor to low.The Reset hole (A small hole, On top of the top left corner of the car dash cam), meet some problems, you can poke the hole to reset the car dash camera.To ensure seamless video recording, please kindly turn off "Motion Detection" and "Auto Power off" on this dashboard camera while you driving.If you want the car camera's screen off but the dashcam still keeps a record, simply select "Screen Saver" in the settings and the dash cam will keep a normal record.If you want to turn off the on/off sound of this front dash cam with 32GB card, you can turn it off by finding "Switch Sound/Boot Sound" in the settings. This dashcam just have the front car camera, not have the rear camera!!! If you want the rear camera, please mail us we will send it to you.How to setup the date/time?? When the dash cams is recording, please press power button to stop record. Then SHORT press menu button TWICE into the tool menu page, and then press down button to find the "date/time" option, press power button to choose. And then press down/up button to change the number, press power button to move. NOTE: Last June, there was a batch of defective batteries, but we later replaced them with stronger ones. If you purchased a dash camera for cars last year and are experiencing battery issues, please let us know, and we will provide you with a new dash cam. In the product details page, you may notice some battery swelling issues. These problems were all related to the batch from last June. Please rest assured that we have already provided satisfactory compensation solutions for these customers and have addressed the battery issues. You can confidently make your purchase now!!! Recently, there have been comments that the Memory card is full, and the dash cam can only record 5 or 10 minutes of video before stopping recording. Firstly, you can check if the Memory card is damaged. You can replace it with a brand new 32GB high-speed class 10 memory card, then default the factory settings of the dash cam, format the memory card on the car camera again, and see if the dash camera can work properly. Please rest assured that whether it is a damaged memory card or a problem with the dash cam, we will provide you with a replacement or compensation. Due to the fact that the suction cup is a consumable item, If you encounter damage to the suction cup, please let us know and we will send you a brand new one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great price, easy set up and works great. The instructions are kind of hard to understand the true working video of the camera

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good simple dash cam with great service
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these in September 2023 to replace my 8 year old dash cam . I didn't have too much to spend and I don't need all the bells and whistles. Just something simple to use just like my old one. This fits the criteria. I watched setup instructions video and the whole setup and installation process was simple. I was impressed with the picture quality and wide angle. I like it so much I bought another one to replace the one in another car in our household. Fast forward to last week, I noticed one of the SD card was not working. I checked the other dash cam, sure enough, the SD card was not recording as well. I was not happy to say the least. I contacted seller, and Ying replied right away. She asked me to explain in detail what's going on. Problem was solved with a few messages. I am very pleased with the quick response from the seller. I hope this dash cam will last me a good few years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: This camera included everything you need, including the 32gb micro chip. It was easy to set up and the instructions were helpful, telling you what their recommended settings are so you at least have a place to start from it you don't understand what the setting is even for. The view is wide and covers far right and left of your windshield, and the day images are clear, but the night recordings are rather fuzzy - can't read even the largest interstate signs. Perhaps there's a setting I haven't investigated fully yet to clear those up. So don't misunderstand, I think this is a great camera for the money and I plan to get another couple of them for my other cars (this was for my husband's car).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A record in case you need it
reviews.reviewText: This is the second one of this brand that I have bought. The display went out after about a year and a half on the other one. Camera still recorded, but I couldn’t tell what my settings were. So, this new one seems to have a better picture than the first one, and just like the first one, this one has the place to plug in a back up camera if you want to. My first one came with the back up camera, so I got just the dash camera this time and the back up camera works well with the new camera. Overall, for the price and features, I don’t think you can go wrong with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Possible cheap quality but performs as advertised
reviews.reviewText: After two months of use, the power/ok button is broken. The camera can still be used, but settings can no longer be changed. Also with the broken button if the card needs to be formatted, the card must be removed and formatted on a computer or laptop instead of right on the camera. This can be a downside on a longer roadtrip or even with daily driving depending on settings, etc. The provided suction cup works well and so far has survived in the AZ heat. Short of the broken button, the camera performs as advertised with good video and audio quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Dash Cam. Easy install
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. Easy to install and easy to use. I really like it. Can't go wrong for a great price too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY IF YOUR CAR HAS A CONSTANT 12v OUTLET
reviews.reviewText: NO WHERE DOES THIS WARN YOU that if your 12v cigarette outlet is a constant the Dashcam WILL NOT TURN ON/OFF when you start/stop your car,DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOUR 12v IS A CONSTANT POWER.I installed this with the supplier suction cup which seems nice, I tucked all the wire leading from the dashcam to the only 12v outlet I have which was pretty simple if you have a little bit of knowledge on the interior of cars.When I plugged it in and powered on the car, nothing happened, so I turned on the dashcam, followed the extremely useless instructions, formatted the card in the menu settings and then started to customize the settings, which by the way IS A HUGE PAIN, not user friendly at all.After all that I turned off the car, the dashcam stays on, the only way it will turn off on its own is if I have the “Auto-Off” setting turned on, increments of 1min, 2min, 3 min. So not a huge deal, I set the Auto-off to 1min and it shuts off, and when I get in I just have to turn it on, no biggie right? Right.But, I was super excited to use the “Parking Guard” and the “motion sensor” for when I wasn’t in the car, I recently got backed into and the person never left insurance info, no surprise there…but with the Parking Guard set, and tested, the Dashcam won’t turn off after a “collision” is detected, it just stays recording, I watched it for over 5 minutes just to make sure…I assume because the 12v power is a constant, it should turn off after 30 seconds after a collision and 10 seconds after motion is detected, so basically if I have the Parking guard turned on and the car gets bumped it will stay recording all night and not auto turn off.The Motion sensor setting won’t even turn on, I set it to “On” in the menu, turn it off and wave my hand in front of it and nothing happens, I go back in to check the setting and the Motion Sensor is off, no matter what I do it won’t stay on.You cannot use the motion sensor or parking guard while driving, you have to turn those on every time you park. So that’s dumb too.The night camera is 100% USELESS if you want plate information, and I’m sure it’s just as useless durning the day, I know it’s wide angle but there is NO WAY you’d ever make out a license plate number if you needed it.Do not buy into these positive reviews, this thing is junk! Quality is ok at best, customer service is terrible and the interface menu is ridiculously annoying to use,Keep looking and spend a little more money, this is 100% a you get what you pay for scenario.I read a lot of things on the internet that said you couldn’t use a USB to power this, but I also saw where you could, I ordered a Mini USB cable designed for Dashcam and such that will fit this Dashcam, I’ll update if it works.But don’t take my word for it, go ahead and buy it and then be like “darn, he was right”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value and works perfectly
reviews.reviewText: i feel so much safer knowing things are recorded. Too many crazy drivers out there and this product enables you to provide a record should something happen

I like my new dashcam. It was a good value purchase. Lots of useful features and options, easy menu to get you started. oh and thank you for the 32GB SD card. So far the dash cam has been great and the video recordings are good enough to read license plates.
It’s perfect , easy to use / install, small and compact, great quality, priced rightPictures / videos are very clearWould highly recommendAnd seller is very responsive

reviews.reviewTitle: Best one I have ever purchased
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing dash cam, clear picture, easy to set up and use. Just have to get the backup cam now.

The media could not be loaded. I have no experience with dash cams and can only comment based on video quality from what others post on Youtube or other social media. Had this for a few days and reviewed many clips to ensure the camera's quality consistency.Pros:- less expensive than other cameras- includes a 32GB micro SD card- wide angle recording as advertised- relatively easy to figure out and install- haven't tried to hide the cable yet so not sure if it's long enough- so far it has been functioning without issuesCons:- picture quality is not great, is very grainy in the dark and even during the day- would expect more from a FHD 1080p camera- won't be able to record any license plates or street names at night. When light reflects the camera can't capture any details- lighting must be perfect in order to capture car license in front of you- need to be within a few feet to clearly see license plateSummary:Entry level camera that records with the video quality being so so. Even during the day the camera does not adjust to the lighting so detailed info (street names, license plates) may not be recorded. The grainy aspect is also something that could be better. At the same time, it might simply be "you get what you pay for". If you're not looking for high quality video and just something as a peace of mind then I think this camera does the job.
